p: Acceptability: On average, five out of the six sentinel sites detect influenza cases each year (83%) and about 80% of case investigation forms sampled were completely filled out by ILI personnel. All sentinel staff interviewed reported satisfaction with feedback from NIC and test results from collected specimen are on average tested within 2 days. Most of the sites (5/6) however, do not meet the case detection quota for each year with some recording as low as three suspected cases per year only (see Fig 3).
